name: Demo User DZS – Showcase your admin safely
author: Digital Zoom Studio

sections.description:
If you have a plugin or theme developed that you want to let users have a peek at the admin panel, but don’t want the demo users to be able to actually modify the environment, then this is the plugin you can use.

  • option to autocomplete user and password in the login screen
  • option to choose target demo user
  • extensive control of target user’s capability range
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Options appear in the dashboard > Demo user
sections.faq:
Is it translatable ?

You will need poedit to create the translate files

short_description: Demo User helps plugin developers showcase their admin panels to their clients without the risk of clients modifying the actual environment.
